poha.description:
The interview was recorded on April 17, 2004 with Fāṭimah al-Waḥayyid, female, born in Maʻdhar, Palestine and resides in al-Burj al-Shamālī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع فاطمة الوحيد في 17 نيسان ابريل عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت في معذر، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم البرج الشمالي للاجئين الفلسطينيين، لبنان.
poha.contents: Manners and customs in Palestine. (@ 0:34)||Land sale to the Jews . (@ 12:54)||Social and cultural life. (@ 17:58)||Palestine during the Arab Revolt, 1936-1939. (@ 35:40)||Dayshūm during 1948 . (@ 47:15)||Leaving Dayshūm and life in exile. (@ 53:24)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on April 12, 2004 with ʻAlī Saʻīd al-Mughrabī, male, born in 1926 in Maʻdhar, Palestine. 

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع علي سعيد المغربي في 12 نيسان 2006، ذكر، ولد عام 1926 في معذر، فلسطين.
poha.contents: Economic conditions at Maʻdhar during the British Mandate. (@ 0:01)||Wedding traditions and land appropriation . (@ 24:31)||Arab Revolution during British colonialism . (@ 51:30)||War events and the expulsion to Lebanon. (@ 70:20)

poha.description:
The interview was recorded on June 15, 1997 with ʻAlī Saʻīd al- Mughrabī, male, born in 1928 in Maʻdhar, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع علي سعيد المغربي في 15 حزيران يونيو عام 1997، ذكر، ولد عام 1928 في مَعـذر، فلسطين.
poha.contents: Land legislation in Palestine. (@ 0:01)||Land ownership in Palestine. (@ 12:59)||Zionist infiltration and political turmoil. (@ 18:15)||Violence,battles and armed resistance. (@ 29:7)||War time and military occupation. (@ 39:6)||Refugees and Displacement (@ 49:2)||Refugee life. (@ 63:47)||Land, refugees and return. (@ 79:29)
